name: USMDS - U.S. Web Design System for React Native

items.name: alert
items.title: Alert
items.description: Displays a callout for user attention.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar
items.description: An image element with a fallback for representing the user.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: Displays a badge or a component that looks like a badge.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: banner
items.title: Banner
items.description: USWDS Banner component for official government websites.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: biometricsignin
items.title: Biometric Sign In
items.description: Biometric authentication component with Face ID and Touch ID support.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: Displays a button or a component that looks like a button.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: buttongroup
items.title: Button Group
items.description: A group of related buttons displayed together.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: Displays a card with header, content, and footer.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: checkbox
items.title: Checkbox
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: checkboxtile
items.title: Checkbox Tile
items.description: A tile-style checkbox component.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: collapsible
items.title: Collapsible
items.description: An interactive component which expands/collapses a panel.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: dialog
items.title: Dialog
items.description: A window overlaid on either the primary window or another dialog window.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: icon
items.title: Icon
items.description: Icon component wrapper for lucide-react-native.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: label
items.title: Label
items.description: Renders an accessible label associated with controls.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: link
items.title: Link
items.description: A navigational link component.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: native-only-animated-view
items.title: Native Only Animated View
items.description: An animated view wrapper that only enables animations on native platforms.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: pagination
items.title: Pagination
items.description: Pagination component for navigating through pages.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: progress
items.title: Progress
items.description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: radiobutton
items.title: Radio Button
items.description: A set of checkable buttons where no more than one can be checked at a time.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: radiogroup
items.title: Radio Group
items.description: A set of checkable buttons—known as radio buttons—where no more than one of the buttons can be checked at a time.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: radiotile
items.title: Radio Tile
items.description: A tile-style radio button component.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: snackbar
items.title: Snackbar
items.description: A brief message displayed at the bottom of the screen.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: stepindicator
items.title: Step Indicator
items.description: Shows progress through a multi-step process.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: tag
items.title: Tag
items.description: A tag or label component.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: text
items.title: Text
items.description: A text component with USWDS typography styles.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: A multi-line text input field.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: textinput
items.title: Text Input
items.description: A single-line text input field.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: toggle
items.title: Toggle
items.description: A two-state button that can be either on or off.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: accordion
items.title: Accordion
items.description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: alert-dialog
items.title: Alert Dialog
items.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a response.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: aspect-ratio
items.title: Aspect Ratio
items.description: Displays content within a desired ratio.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: context-menu
items.title: Context Menu
items.description: Displays a menu to the user — triggered by a right-click or long-press.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: dropdown-menu
items.title: Dropdown Menu
items.description: Displays a menu to the user — such as a set of actions or functions — triggered by a button.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: hover-card
items.title: Hover Card
items.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: menubar
items.title: Menubar
items.description: A visually persistent menu common in desktop applications that provides quick access to a consistent set of commands.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: popover
items.title: Popover
items.description: Displays rich content in a portal, triggered by a button.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: select
items.title: Select
items.description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from—triggered by a button.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: Visually or semantically separates content.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: skeleton
items.title: Skeleton
items.description: Use to show a placeholder while content is loading.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: A set of layered sections of content—known as tab panels—that are displayed one at a time.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: toggle-group
items.title: Toggle Group
items.description: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A popup that displays information related to an element when the element receives keyboard focus, the mouse hovers over it, or when it is pressed.
items.author: @blencorp
